channel.title: R on Anna's blog
channel.description: Recent content in R on Anna's blog

item.title: How to make a blog in R blogdown and Github Pages
item.description: This post is made for and also published in the blog of community women.code(be). The purpose of this tutorial This is a quick tutorial on how to create a blog with R and deploy it to Github Pages. It is useful for anyone who wants to make a static website in markdown and host it for free. It can be also helpful if you just want to get some practice with markdown or R markdown, learn web site basics and R programming language.

item.title: Correlation analysis limitations in examples
item.description: Preview Correlation analysis is a common method for studying a relationship between two variables and data exploration. Here I do not intend to explain in much details the theoretical part of the correlation analysis but I want to provide several practical examples where this method is applicable or not. For that purpose, I will generate simple datasets in R, create plots and discuss the obtained results. If you are more interested in the theory of correlation analysis or tools for correlation analsis in R or other programming languages, I would refer to another works then.
